      • getRelativePath

        public java.lang.String getRelativePath(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> roots,
                               boolean inclRoot)
        Get the relative path of the node up to any of the specified origins
        Parameters:
        roots - is a list of root artifact Ids (Integers)
        inclRoot - is true to include the root into the returned path, false to not include root

      • getChildren

      • getChildren

        public java.util.List<Directory.Node> getChildren(java.lang.Boolean deleted)
        Get a list with the direct child directories of this directory
        Parameters:
        deleted - is null, TRUE or FALSE in order to get all, only the deleted or not deleted child directories

      • getChild

        public Directory.Node getChild(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.Boolean deleted)
        Get the named child. If more than one child with the same name exists, the newest one (with the highest id) is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - of the requested child
        deleted - is null, TRUE or FALSE in order to get all, only the deleted or not deleted child
        Returns:
        the named child with the specified deleted status, or null if no such child exists

      • getChild

        public Directory.Node getChild(java.lang.String name,
                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> types,
                      java.lang.Boolean deleted)
        Get the named child. If more than one child with the same name exists, the newest one (with the highest id) is returned.
        Parameters:
        name - of the requested child
        types - is a collection of child types to get, or null to get children of any types
        deleted - is null, TRUE or FALSE in order to get all, only the deleted or not deleted child
        Returns:
        the named child with the specified deleted status, or null if no such child exists

      • getDescendants

        public java.util.List<Directory.Node> getDescendants(java.lang.Boolean deleted,
                                            java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> types)
        Get a list with all descendant directories of this directory (inclusive) ordered top down
        Parameters:
        deleted - is null, TRUE or FALSE in order to get all, only the deleted or not deleted descendant directories
        types - is a collection of descendant types to get, or null to get descendants of any types

      • getDescendants

                     java.lang.Boolean deleted)

        Parameters:
